top_categories.workout_context: 200 miles. Your legs will beg to quit after 120. This trains the power output you need from mile 130 onward.
200 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 200 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
Texas Hell Week's Texas rolling gravel, Multi-day event forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 200 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Texas Hell Week's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before March.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 8,000ft of climbing on Texas rolling gravel does to your power file on race day.
Texas Hell Week's Texas rolling gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
At Texas Hell Week, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
8,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
8,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Texas Hell Week. Train it until it feels boring.
Tempo is Texas Hell Week's race pace. The wattage you'll hold for 200 miles on Texas rolling gravel. Train it until it's automatic.

race_overlay.nutrition: Ultra-distance fueling for 200 miles: 80–100g carbs/hour from mile 1 — don’t wait until you’re hungry. Practice your exact race-day nutrition in every long training ride. Carry backup calories. 200 miles burns 8,000–12,000+ calories — you cannot replace them all, but you must try.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Texas Hell Week requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on texas rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: texas rolling gravel, multi-day event, summer heat challenge.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, HVLI Extended, and Endurance to prepare you for 200 miles of texas rolling gravel in Warda, Texas.
